headline: Pentair to Attend J.P. Morgan Industrials Conference
summary: LONDON, March 03, 2025--Pentair plc (NYSE: PNR), a leader in helping the world sustainably move, improve and enjoy water, life’s most essential resource, will be attending the J.P. Morgan Industrials Conference on March 11th in New York City. President and Chief Executive Officer John Stauch will present at 11:15 a.m. Eastern Time.

headline: nVent: A Sound Business Is Approaching Interesting Levels
summary: nVent has seen growth through M&A and organic expansion, positioning well in electrical markets despite recent soft organic growth. Learn more on NVT stock here.
